alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 02 at 11:16AM AKDT until June 02 at 9:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR HIGH TEMPERATURES, LOW HUMIDITY, AND BREEZY CONDITIONS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 019 AND 025... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 019 and 025. * WIND...May reach speeds up to 15 mph. * HUMIDITY...Relative humidity will fall into the low 20s or upper teens with temperatures in the mid 70s and 80s on Thursday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended. A warning means that severe fire weather conditions are already occurring or imminent in the warning area. Temperatures will warm rapidly through the early afternoon. Breezy conditions will aid steep reductions in relative humidity as well which will enhance the spread of any uncontained fires should they develop. Confidence is high that red flag conditions will develop by mid- day. These conditions may persist through Friday and an extension to this red flag warning may become necessary. Please advise the appropriate officials and fire crews in the field of this red flag warning. This statement will be updated by 9 PM AKDT Thursday or sooner if conditions warrant. &&

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
